title: The Blue Planet (TEFC)
creator_credit: Roger Hudson, Jim Dale, Dept of Marine Services and University of Sydney Television Service
brief_description: Looks at the oceans of the World and the development of, and basics of oceanography. Considers the effect and benefit of scientific study of the oceans for sailors, yachtsmen, surfers, environmentalists, scientists, engineers and architects.
